item.title: Noida International Airport partners with Mahindra Logistics for electric taxi service
item.description: Under this agreement, Mahindra Logistics will operate a fleet of 100% electric vehicles, offering passengers a comfortable and environmentally friendly ride.

item.title: Researchers find security flaws in Skoda cars that may let hackers remotely track them
item.description:
Security researchers have discovered multiple vulnerabilities in the infotainment units used in some Skoda cars that could allow malicious actors to remotely trigger certain controls and track the cars’ location in real time. PCAutomotive, a cybersecurity firm specializing in the automotive sector, unveiled 12 new security vulnerabilities impacting the latest model of the Skoda Superb […]

item.title: Japan Airlines Combats Overcrowding With Same-Day Luggage Delivery Service
item.description: The airline promises to deliver the luggage the same day, excluding weather or traffic-related delays

item.title: Dramatic Moment Truck Explodes Injuring First Responders With Flying Debris
